## IBuildOptions interface

Set options that controls how OpenAPI doc is generated

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBuildOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [noIncludeOptionsMethod?](./cdk-rest-api-with-spec.ibuildoptions.noincludeoptionsmethod.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Do not include OPTIONS in openAPI output file |
|  [usePhysicalName?](./cdk-rest-api-with-spec.ibuildoptions.usephysicalname.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Use modelName instead of generated name for models |
